original_text: SBA Communications (SBAC) Q3 FFO and Revenues Surpass Estimates Recap: SBA Communications Q3 Earnings SBA Communications Corporation Reports Third Quarter 2020 Results; Updates Full Year 2020 Outlook; and Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend SBA Communications Corp. to Host Earnings Call
